pJointPointInPlane Class Reference
[Joints]

A point in plane joint constrains a point on one actor to only move inside a plane attached to another actor. The point attached to the plane is defined by the anchor point. The joint's axis specifies the plane normal. More...

Inherits pJoint.

    Enables collision between both bodies.

Detailed Description

A point in plane joint constrains a point on one actor to only move inside a plane attached to another actor. The point attached to the plane is defined by the anchor point. The joint's axis specifies the plane normal.

DOFs removed: 1
DOFs remaining: 5

See also:
pFactory::createPointInPlaneJoint()
